page.title: 06How Schools Have Changed
page.content: In the 1950's there were only three schools in Linlithgow:_ Linlithgow Academy,which was where Lowport primary is today,St.Josephs primary which was beside St.Micheals R.C.church and Linlithgow primary which was where the Westport primary is today. In the 1960's St.Josephs moved up to a new building at Preston Road and round about the same time Linlithgow primary moved to their new building at Preston Road as well.The Academy also moved to new premises at Braehead Road.The old Academy became offices before becoming Lowport Primary. By the 1980's Linlithgow was expanding and Lowport had too many children so they built a new Primary school in the middle of Springfield housing estate.
